Package org.jcvi.jillion.trace.fastq

This package contains classes for dealing with fastq data.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FastqDataStore
    FastqDataStore is a marker-interface for a DataStore of FastqRecords.
    FastqFileDataStore
    FastqFileDataStore is a FastqDataStore where all the FastqRecords in the datastore belong to the same .fastq file.
    FastqParser
    FastqParser is an interface that will parse a FASTQ formatted structure and call the appropriate visit methods on the given FastqVisitor.
    FastqRecord
    FastqRecord is an object representation of a read from a fastq encoded file.
    FastqRecordBuilder
    FastqRecordBuilder is a Builder implementation that can create new instances of FastqRecords.
    FastqRecordVisitor
    FastqRecordVisitor is a visitor interface to visit a single fastq record inside of a fastq file.
    FastqVisitor
    FastqVisitor is a visitor interface to visit components of a single fastq file.
    FastqVisitor.FastqVisitorCallback
    FastqVisitorCallback is a callback mechanism for the FastqVisitor instance to communicate with the parser that is parsing the fastq data.
    FastqVisitor.FastqVisitorCallback.FastqVisitorMemento
    FastqVisitorMemento is a marker interface that FastqFileParser instances can use to "rewind" back to the position in its fastq file in order to revisit portions of the fastq file.
    FastqWriter
    FastqWriter is an interface that handles writing out FastqRecords.
    SplitFastqWriter.DeconvolveFastqRecordWriterFactory<K>
    Functional interface to create new FastqWriter instances.
    SplitFastqWriter.FastqWriterFactory
    Functional interface to create new FastqWriter instances.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFastqRecordVisitor  
    AbstractFastqVisitor
    AbstractFastqVisitor is a FastqVisitor implementation that implements all methods as no-ops.
    FastqFileDataStoreBuilder
    FastqFileDataStoreBuilder is a Builder that can create new instances of FastqDataStores using data from a given input fastq file.
    FastqFileParser
    Contains factory methods to create new FastqParser objects that will parse a single fastq encoded file or InputStream and call the appropriate visitXXX methods on the given FastqVisitor.
    FastqFileParser.OffsetMemento  
    FastqFileParserBuilder
    Creates a FastqParser that parses the given fastq encoded file along with additional configuration options to support FastqVisitor.FastqVisitorCallback.FastqVisitorMementos , multiline fastq records that take more than 4 lines each and also allows parsing comments on the deflines of fastq records.
    FastqFileReader
    Helper class to simplify the process of reading Fastq encoded files to just get the Stream of FastqRecord objects.
    FastqFileReader.Results
    Results of a fastq file read operation, accessor methods can be used to get a Stream of the FastqRecords contained in the file.
    FastqUtil
    FastqUtil is a utility class for working with FASTQ data.
    FastqWriterBuilder
    FastqWriterBuilder is a Builder that builds an instance of FastqWriter.
    IlluminaUtil
    IlluminaUtil is a utility class for working with Illumina data.
    SplitFastqWriter
    Utility class that creates FastqWriter instances that split the FastqRecord objects being written out over several different output files.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FastqQualityCodec
    FastqQualityCodec is a can encode and decode The different ways a FASTQ file can be encode quality data.

Package org.jcvi.jillion.trace.fastq Description

This package contains classes for dealing with fastq data.
